#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long long int t,k,k1,n,i,ans;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&k);
        if(k==1)
            printf("%lld\n",n);
        else
        {
            ans=0;
        while(n>0)
        {
            k1=n%k;
            ans+=k1;
            n=n/k;
        }
      printf("%lld\n",ans);
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
